void MWClass::Light::enable ( const MWWorld::Ptr &  ptr,
MWWorld::Environment &  environment 
) const [virtual]

Enable reference; only does the non-rendering part

Attention:
This is not the same as the script instruction with the same name. References should only be enabled while in an active cell.
